[@arj](@6CAxOI3f+LUOVrbAl0IemqiS7ATpQvr9Mdw9LC4+Uv0=.ed25519) 

I was just typing `/public` into my search bar and I noticed `/postRank`. This is really cool! Do you have any recommendations on how to tweak it, or should I just keep playing around with different values and see what happens? I imagine this only works in `/posts`, right?
